articles.description: Maurice Johnston was born in Glasgow on 13 April 1963. He began his career at Partick Thistle in 1981, scoring 41 goals in 85 appearances, before winning a transfer to Elton John’s Watford in 1983. Johnston scored 23 league goals in English football, made his international debut, and helped the team reach 1984 FA Cup Read More
articles.title: Judas Day of Infamy – A despicable deed done to hurt Celtic

articles.description:
Callum McGregor played his first match since February without his now trademark protective face mask. The Celtic Captain marched on last season after a very significant cheekbone injury suffered during a Scottish Cup tie. Celtic supporters have grown to love the Celtic Captain’s mask and his performances in it. Not long after Callum sustained the […]
Source
articles.title: Callum McGregor Drops Title Winning Mask

articles.description: ANGE POSTECOGLOU has confirmed Celtic have made a £125,000 bid for St Mirren’s teenage midfielder Dylan Reid. The Scotland Under-17 international has been monitored by Hoops scouts and the move could be rubberstamped early next week. In-demand Reid, who has attracted interest elsewhere, has been earmarked for a place in the youth set-up at the [...]
articles.title: CELTIC £125,000 BID FOR TEEN ACE

articles.description: ANGE POSTECOGLOU continued his Celtic clear-out with midfielder Ismaila Soro agreeing a season-long loan deal at Portuguese top-flight club FC Arouca on loan. The Ivorian, who cost Neil Lennon £2million when he arrived from Israeli outfit Bnei Yehuda in January 2020, was left out of the Hoops’ 10-day training camp in Austria in an attempt [...]
articles.title: SORO JOINS HOOPS DEPARTURES

articles.description: An effigy of Shannon…an effing disgrace! There are few beacons of hope in this so called Union just now, but Shannon’s graduation, with her wish to teach at the Holy Cross Primary School is certainly one. This is 5 year old Shannon in the red cardigan during the Holy Cross School onslaught when Loyalists attempted Read More
articles.title: An effigy of Shannon? More like an effing disgrace

articles.description: CELTIC will miss out on a cash bonanza if former striker Moussa Dembele joins Southampton. The French frontman has been linked with a move to the south coast club for a bargain £10million. That is almost HALF the fee accepted by the Hoops for the one-time Fulham prospect when Lyon snatched him from Parkhead on [...]
articles.title: MOUSSA DEMBELE: CELTIC MISS OUT

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou has solved the Anthony Ralston and Josip Juranovic mystery from the so-called friendly match against Rapid Vienna yesterday afternoon which ended in a 3-3 draw. The absence of both right backs raised a few eyebrows as for the second match in a row Osaze Urhoghide was given the full 90 minutes to make Read More
articles.title: Missing in Vienna – Ralston-Juranovic riddle solved

articles.description:
Ange Postecoglou was delighted with Celtic’s Saturday night effort after drawing 3-3 with Rapid Vienna. The Australian played two different teams in each half and got minutes into the legs of most of his squad. There was some rustiness out there, for most of the players, it was there first bit of football in a […]
Source
articles.title: Ange Spot on With Post-Match Celtic Comments

articles.description: Joe Hart this week looked forward to his own personal return to the Champions League after an absence of almost six years. Back in 2016 Hart was in goals for Manchester City in a closely fought semi-final tussle with Real Madrid with the Spanish giants as they ofter do, winning through with the only goal Read More
articles.title: Celtic’s Champions League challenge as Joe Hart says there’s no point moaning about money

articles.description: CELTIC legend Davie Hay continues his revelations with a look back 45 years ago when the club welcomed a new manager. In another CQN EXCLUSIVE,  the club’s former player and boss turns the spotlight on the team Wim Jansen assembled – including Henrik Larsson – that turned around the fortunes of the Parkhead club. And [...]
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: WIM, HENRIK AND BUILDING A TEAM TO STOP 10-IN-A-ROW – DAVIE HAY TELLS ALL

articles.description: Premier League side Southampton are eyeing a deal for Moussa Dembele from Lyon, which could result in money headed to Celtic. The Scottish Champions may finally see a return in the sell-on fee that was added to Dembele’s contract when he was sold to Lyon in 2018. According to The Scottish Sun, Dembele is a Read More
articles.title: Premier League club eyeing a cut-price deal for Moussa Dembele

articles.description: EXACTLY thirty-three years ago today, Mo Johnston turned his back on Celtic, the club he professed to love, to join Rangers. Author Alex Gordon, who has written fifteen Celtic books including ’50 Flags Plus One’, a tribute to the club’s first 51 untainted titles, devoted a chapter in his first newspaper memoirs, ‘Jinx Dogs Burns [...]
articles.title: MO JOHNSTON: THE LYING GAME

articles.description:
Celtic are close to completing a move for St Mirren Midfielder Dylan Reid according to FootballScot. Ange Postecoglou has confirmed Celtic’s move fire the talented youngster but admitted this won’t be a first team move. Postecoglou said: “I think [Dylan Reid] that’s more for our B team. “Again, I’d love to be the man for […]
Source
articles.title: Offer Accepted; Celtic Closing in On Midfield Signing

articles.description:
Ismaila Soro has gone out on loan to Portuguese side FC Arouca for the season. The news has been confirmed after Ismaila was left out of Celtic‘s training camp in Austria. The midfielder stayed behind in Glasgow to get a move sorted and will now join up with his new teammates in Portugal. Soro came […]
Source
articles.title: Forgotten Celt Earns Parkhead Exit

articles.description: Celtic have made a £125k bid for St Mirren midfielder Dylan Reid, according to a report. The 17-year-old is subject to interest from down south but Ange Postecoglou and the Celtic scouting team believe that the player has the potential to excel with The Scottish Champions. According to The Scottish Sun, talks are ongoing between Read More
articles.title: Celtic make £125k bid for highly rated Premiership midfielder
